result.name: greening-government-data-for-dclg-and-arms-length-bodies-also-dfe
result.notes: Data includes gas, electricity and water usage, waste tonnage produced, paper procured, and data on business travel costs and carbon usage

organization.name: department-for-communities-and-local-government
organization.title: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government
organization.description:
The Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government's (formerly the Department for Communities and Local Government) job is to create great places to live and work, and to give more power to local people to shape what happens in their area.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-housing-communities-and-local-government

result.title: Greening Government data for DCLG and Arms' Length Bodies [also DfE]

extras.value: This data is published annually within the Annual Report and Accounts and within the Greening Government Commitments Annual report, both of which are made publicly available on gov.uk. Real-time energy data is also published monthly
